text:
Antony John Blinken (born April 16, 1962) is an American politician. He was the United States Deputy Secretary of State from 2015 to 2017 and Deputy National Security Advisor from 2013 to 2015 under President Barack Obama.
In November 2020, President-elect Joe Biden chose Blinken to be United States Secretary of State.
He plays guitar and has two songs available on Spotify.

annotations.surface_form: United States Deputy Secretary of State
